roleset.name: automatically measure refraction
roleset.note: AUTOREFRACTION-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Slight comparison to refration. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from autorefraction.01-n)

role.descr: explicit mention of machine used, instrument

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: His autorefraction of the eye was quite exact from a technical perspective.
